item.title: Photos: Scenes from the No Kings Protests
item.description: People gathered for pro-democracy protests across the country today.

item.title: Why are so many rich Americans investing in British soccer teams?
item.description: American millionaires and celebrities are buying up British soccer teams in record numbers.
